title: Homeward Bound: Lebron James Declares His Return To Cleveland
teaser: Lebron James has made a decision: He's returning home to Ohio, to play for the Cleveland Cavaliers. Terry Pluto of The Plain Dealer has been watching James play since his high school days in Akron, and he speaks to Melissa Block about the reasons behind the decision.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
